sentences.sContent: Casuarina equisetifolia is a tropical xerophyte species and can adapt in ighlt salinized soil.
sentences.sContent_eng: Casuarina equisetifolia is a tropical xerophyte species and can adapt in ighlt salinized soil.
sentences.sCn: 木麻黄是热带旱生类型植物，但能适应轻盐渍土。

sentences.sContent: The species of mesophyte are the most of ecological type of water and those of xerophyte take 7.51%. The volcanic landform has a profound influence on plant diversity.
sentences.sContent_eng: The species of mesophyte are the most of ecological type of water and those of xerophyte take 7.51%. The volcanic landform has a profound influence on plant diversity.
sentences.sCn: 在水分生态类型中，中生植物是主要的生态类型，旱生植物占总种数的7.51%。火山地貌对植物多样性具有深刻影响。

trans.tranOther: a xerophilous plant, such as a cactus
